## Who are we?

![](images/logo-wide.png)

The Perception, Action, & Development Lab is directed by [Dr. John Franchak](people/john-franchak.qmd) in the UC Riverside [Department of Psychology](https://psychology.ucr.edu/). Dr. Franchak advises students in the [Developmental](https://psychology.ucr.edu/developmental-psychology) and [Cognition and Cognitive Neuroscience](https://psychology.ucr.edu/cognition-and-cognitive-neuroscience) areas of the Psychology Department, and he is a member of the [Quantitative Specialized Subfield](https://psychology.ucr.edu/specialized-subfields-study#quantitative-psychology). The lab's research is funded by grants from the [National Science Foundation](posts/2025-08-12-nsf.qmd) and [James S. McDonnell Foundation](posts/2022-08-11-jsmf.qmd)

## Join our team

We are hiring a staff researcher in Winter/Spring of 2026. Please check the [job posting](https://jobsportal.ucr.edu/jobs/36954340) for more details.

We are accepting applications for undergraduate research assistants on a rolling basis. Please fill out the [form](https://forms.gle/QJgJk5CZxzj8qufr5), and we will get back to you when we have openings. 

Dr. Franchak does not plan to accept a doctoral student for the 2026-2027 academic year.
